input.sentences: on the weekends i play my guitar at a local restaurant .
i play many different tunes that my friends sing along to .
here is my friend [male] | he came out to support me .
[male] brought his brother along to hear me play .
here is the entire gang at the end of another great show !
output.sentences: On the weekend Eric goes to a local restaurant to play his guitar.
He has original songs but will also play tunes that people know so they can sing along.
Even though I'm a female and he's a male I consider him a dear friend I support his musical career.
He's also a beautiful singer and is by far my favorite male singing voice so I don't mind going to hear him play.
Sometimes it's just him and I, but most of the time the entire gang gets together to listen to our favorite musician.
